content: Though the spec for $validate says that a successful validation operation should return 200, all servers I try return 400 or 500 on invalid resources. Is the spec incorrect or implementations?
does it make a difference how it's invalid? try differentiating between invalid-won't-parse and invalid-by-fule
I can't tell if the server errored validating, ie its validation operation is broken and it'll return 500 even on a valid resource
Yes, it makes a difference on how it is invalid. Informative error messages are always useful.
5xx should only mean the server encountered an error, not that the input was invalid
you can't always tell the difference when things fail in the stack
